column4: How do I acces Wine C: disk? I want to run a .exe file but i do not know how to get there   osmodivs@Djiin:~$ cd /home/osmodivs/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Archivos de programa/Adobe/Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 3.3
bash: cd: /home/osmodivs/.wine/dosdevices/c:/Archivos: No such file or directory
Yeah, it worked, I had to cd .wine
